**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Crimson Acolyte](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1719) **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 62 **Perception** +23 **Languages** [Akitonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=94), [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24 **Str** +5 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** +3 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dueling pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201)_ (10 thasteron rounds), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_ --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +25 **Will** +23 evasion **HP** 235 **Ageless** The crimson acolyte doesn't age and doesn't need food or drink to survive.
**Evasion** When the acolyte rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.
**Guarded Movement** The acolyte gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by their movement. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** _fist_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 2d6+11 bludgeoning **Melee** _thousand wounds_ +27 ([Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 2d12+11 piercing **Ranged** _dueling pistol_ +26 ([Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 2d6+10 piercing **Flurry of Blows** ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) **Frequency** once per turn; **Effect** The acolyte makes two [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strikes, or one unarmed Strike and a dueling pistol Strike. If both hit the same creature, combine their damages for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. The acolyte's multiple attack penalty applies normally to these Strikes. **Thousand Ants Stance** ([Stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152)) The acolyte takes the stance of thousand ants, a style mimicking the distracting strikes of a swarm of tiny, vicious creatures. The acolyte can make thousand wounds unarmed attacks. These deal 1d12 piercing damage; are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group; and have the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits. While in this stance, if the acolyte successfully [Trips](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) a target, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of the target's next turn. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The acolyte deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.
name: Crimson Acolyte
